name: Cape Town Backpackers

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at CTBP twice during a 4 month trip earlier this year and would definitely recommend it to others. We had a nice double with ensuite bathroom, but I would say it's the staff, who went out of their way to help us book further accommodation, activities, etc, that really make the place. The cooking facilities were also good and there was a fun bar area with loads of hats (to be worn during happy hour). Location is good - a nice part of CT, with some decent restaurants within walking distance.
reviews.title: Highly recommended

reviews.text: Really enjoyed my stay here. Very friendly staff. Lots of helpful advice and help in booking trips and cars. Good location just off Long Street. Nice bar with good atmosphere.
reviews.title: Recommended

reviews.text: Clean rooms with good showers, if a touch dated.
reviews.title: A friendly hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Only v small safe in the rooms and could do with a larger locker but this seems to be the case with most south african hostels.
reviews.title: Happy Days!

reviews.text: Overall I'd definitely recommend this place particularly for the location, atmosphere and helpful staff.
reviews.title: Hat Me Up

reviews.text: Good basic accommodation. Stayed for 2 nights in a double ensuite. there is a communal kitchen, room for relaxing and safe carpark
reviews.title: Good basic accommodation

reviews.text: I wouldnt normally bother writing a review, but this was by far the worst hostel i stayed in on my 17 day trip through SA. That is not to say it was horrendous, but you can do so much better!
reviews.title: do not be confused with the backpack which is far superior!

reviews.text: The staff were rude and uninterested for the most part. The bar was constantly full of smoke. The room (ensuite twin) was like a bunker with a tiny window. they also happened to be knocking down walls which was unfortunate so the place was like a bomb site.The only good thing about it was that it was quiet so we had a good nights sleep. Anyway, across the road from this place is The Backpack which is infinitely better so i would suggest you go there, but book in advance!
reviews.title: Great Location, Friendly staff

likes.liked: — Helpful, friendly staff. Spacius and clean room.

description: Cape Town Backpackers has a fantastic atmosphere and plenty of style. Its has all of the facilities you would expect from a top quality backpackers including WiFi, and internet access, café and a self-catering kitchen, a comprehensive travel desk, and a great bar to meet fellow travellers. Located in the City Bowl, close to all the main attractions, it offers affordable accommodation – from dorms to deluxe double en suite rooms – and a fun, friendly atmosphere.
